resumeContent.title: My Experience
resumeContent.description: As a Front-End Developer, I have been actively contributing to the development of an e-commerce platform, focusing on enhancing user experience and optimizing performance. I have worked on key features such as the View Order Details page, product ratings & reviews, and the home screen, ensuring a seamless and intuitive interface. To improve application efficiency, I implemented React Query for optimized data fetching and leveraged lazy loading techniques to enhance performance. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, I have played a crucial role in delivering scalable and high-quality front-end solutions that elevate the overall shopping experience.

resumeContent.title: My Education
resumeContent.description: I have a strong academic background that has laid a solid foundation for my career in Software development
